headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Dawn Raid
content: Howâ€™s your multitasking? Sure, you can operate tracking software to identify contraband. Of course, you can parachute from a chopper into a warzone. Naturally, you can use thermal and night vision in a combat scenario. But can you do all that at once while in competition with bunch of psychos every bit as combat-ready as you? Check out the new Adversary Mode, Dawn Raid, to find out.
